name: AdvancedReport
short: Advanced reporting system with context menus and quick actions
description: A comprehensive reporting system for Discord servers featuring both slash commands and context menu reporting, staff quick-action buttons (mute, ban, warn, blacklist), and detailed logging. Supports message-specific reports with jump links and automated staff notifications.
author: RedBot Community
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user report counts, warning history, and blacklist status. No data is shared with third parties.
install_msg: Thank you for installing AdvancedReport! Use `[p]reportset` to configure the system. Set a report channel and staff roles to get started.
